resources.string:
HOW TO 

Make a meeting:
To make a meeting simply tap on the map where you would like the meeting to take place and enter the meeting information.

Edit Meeting:
To edit a meeting select the view meetings item in the side navigation and tap which meeting you would like to edit

Delete a meeting:
To delete a meeting make a long tap on the meeting you wish to delete in the view meetings page and click to confirm

View friends location:
On the home page simply tap on one of the markers to view their name and when they last updated their location

Adding Friends:
To add a friend from your contacts move to the add friend page and select a contact to add.
View Friends:
To view your friends list move to the view friends page, here you can also delete a friend.
